segments.text: Are you ready to go shopping ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Just a minute . I need to make a list of thinks that we need .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Good idea . Have you written down potatoes , carrots , and onions ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don ’ t have onions on my list . I ’ ll add them . We should get some tea . Is green tea ok or should we get the same tea that we usually get ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Let ’ s get both . We need some coffee too . Is that on your list ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , it is . Here ’ s my list . Is there anything that I ’ Ve forgotten ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I think you ’ Ve got everything . I want to got some chocolate and some cheese .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What kind of cheese do you want .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I ’ m not sure . I ’ ll decide at the cheese counter , when I can see what they have . Have we got enough money ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We don ’ t have enough cash , so I ’ ll take my credit card and we can pay with that . Where are the car keys ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I ’ Ve got them there . Shall I drive ?
segments.speaker: S1
